title: Re-match Coverage
description:
Mina and Derrik Klassen of Football Outsiders go game by game previewing the Divisional Round before doing some quick post mortems on the Cardinals, Patriots, Cowboys, and Steelers.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
